EmailTemplate.subject: Do You Volunteer? Log your hours to win Nandos and Amazon vouchers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Have you been volunteering since NCS? Log your hours before the end of April and get:
16 hours logged
The Challenge Society Silver Award Entered into the prize draw for £20 Nandos vouchers and a £50 Amazon voucher
32 Hours Logged
All the above The Challenge Society Gold Award
48 hours logged
All of the above The Distinction Award
To log your hours go to https://www.thechallengesociety.org/login.php?reason=1&continue=%2Fmy-profile-2.php%3F
Email: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
The first two opportunities below can also count towards your hours!
Any questions please don't hesitate to email me (sorry if you are getting this email twice):
Challenge Team Takeover
Give up your time this Easter to shape NCS in Coventry
We need you to design Sponsorship Events for the next NCS programme. Programme taking place in Coventry.
Got some great ideas?
We want to hear from you!
There are only 10 places available in this one off consultation that will allow you to design an important part of the NCS programme.
Times: Thursday 9th April (1-4pm) Thursday 16th April (1-4pm) Venue: City College Coventry, 50 Swanswell Street, Coventry, CV1 5DG.
Click the link below to sign up:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/15wWO-spkwmTa-3jWIEbXRM3OBdJijA2M5PrSie2JfdA/viewform?usp=send_form Coventry Media Team
The Coventry Media Team will soon be launching, filming the NCS programme and creating videos in the summer.
Get media skills and videos to add to your portfolio.
We are look to start after exams. If you would like more details email:
liam.roseblade@the-challenge.org Looking for a career in TV or Production?
Applications are now open for budding talent looking to gain experience behind the camera, The Network is a FREE four-day intensive practical course that teaches everything you need to know about getting into TV, learning from the very people that make it, run it and even star on it!
For more information please visit www.thenetwork-tv.co.uk or email rhiannonrobertson@geitf.co.uk Free Residential with the Sea Cadets
Remember the first week of NCS? Want to relive the experience? Why not trial the sea cadets residential?
On 30th and 31st May there will be a residential weekend by the coast only for NCS graduates from Coventry and Warwickshire.
All transport, accommodation, food and activities are provided.
Why not convince your friends from your wave to sign up?
Click the link below to do it by Thursday 2nd April!
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/10YayP79HeiwOc652pi-_SwKLT1a932FnCh1WP5VxOEA/viewform?usp=send_form
